##Mini Data Analysis of Yinuo Zhou
This repository is for the mini data analysis of the STAT 545A course at the University of British Columbia. In this analysis, I choosed a provided dataset and practiced exploratory analysis on it. 

##This repository contains following files:
_README.Rmd_:A brief introduction of this repository
_mini-project-1.Rmd_:An Rmd file which recorded how I choose the dataset and my initial research questions.
_mini-project-1.md_:An md output that knitted from the according Rmd file.

##You can run this repository by following steps:
1. Clone the repository to your local devices in R studio.
2. Open the _mini-project-1.Rmd_ file.
3. Click the _knit_ button at the upper left corner and get the output.
